cards.rules_text:
Haste
{RGW}{RGW}: Perform target untapped song you control. Activate only once per turn, and only as a sorcery.
When Heartfelt Song, Loronerol attacks, if you have two tapped songs, perform target untapped song you control.

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings.
[i]Black Wings[/i] — {W}{B}: Gain X life. X is the number of -1/-1, defender, poison, and finality counters on creatures opponents control. Activate only once per turn.
[i]White Wings[/i] — {W}{B}: Proliferate, but you can only put -1/-1 and poison counters. Activate only once per turn as a sorcery.
{U}{U}{U}: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

{C}: Put an enchantment artifact from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield tapped. If it's from a universe within or it's colored, this ability costs {C}{C} extra.
Artisaria has menace and shadows you control have lifelink as long as you control two enchantment artifacts with different names.
When Artisaria attacks, you may pay {C} to create X black 2/2 Shadow Army tokens. X is half the number of enchantment artifacts on the battlefield, rounded down.

Undying [i](When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
When Feltyrosa attacks, mill two cards, then you may pay all colored mana costs required to cast target ghost in your graveyard to put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

Riot
{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Target musician or fan returns from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
When this creature attacks, if all attacking musicians have different card names and there are three or more, they gain double strike.

Cascade
[i]Cerulean Blaze[/i] — {W}{UB}, sacrifice an Everlasting Sapphire: Draw a card, then discard a card.
[i]Coral Flash[/i] — {W}{RG}, sacrifice a Truehearted Ruby: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then its controller draws a card. If an opponent drew, proliferate.
cards.flavor_text: [i](Cerulean Blaze and Coral Flash may only be activated once per turn. Only one of each may be activated per turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Friend [i](While you control multiple creatures with friend, they are friends.)[/i]
If you control four or more friends, they gain first strike. If you control seven or more, they gain double strike instead.

Lifelink
When you cast a spell named Trick & Treat for the first time each turn or the first plus a multiple of three, target opponent loses 1 life for each {B} spent to cast it, and you gain that much life.

Hexproof
This creature and tokens you control gain +1/+1 for each type of token on the battlefield.

Cumulative upkeep {1} [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)[/i]
Lyrical Monasterio's cumulative upkeep adds to its mana value.
Crew X [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power X or more: This Nation becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
X is Lyrical Monasterio's mana value.
Lyrical Monasterio is all colors and colorless.
When you cast Truehearted Ruby, if you control a legendary creature with five or more colors, draw two cards.
When you cast Everlasting Sapphire, if you control a human from a universe beyond, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Prismagica, Wilista and Festimagica, Wilista can be cast for {5}, reduced by {1} for each gem you control with different names. If cast this way, you can't use more than one mana of the same type.
Reduce the cost of Cerulean Blaze and Coral Flash by {W}.
Creatures you control with power 10 or greater have first strike while you control Prismagica, Wilista, and lifelink while you control Festimagica, Wilista.

When MegaЯoManiA enters, target nonland permanent is put face-down until its controller's next end step. It can't be interacted with by other cards.
MegaЯoManiA can only enter the battlefield by the ability of a legendary cyberoid.

When Shout in Shadow enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Shadow Army token.
Shout in Shadow can only enter the battlefield by the ability of a legendary cyberoid.

Activate one of the following if you control a legendary human fox. You can't choose one again until you've chosen all three this turn. Each time you perform all three, increase the cost of Trick & Treat by {B} this turn. — 
• Surveil 2, If either card is Trick & Treat, you may exile it, then add it to your hand at the end of this turn.
• If you control a legendary fox from a universe beyond, or you've cast Trick & Treat twice or more this turn, draw a card.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment if this is the third or greater Trick & Treat you've cast this turn.
A deck can have any number of cards named Trick & Treat.

Songs don't untap during your untap step.
When this song enters the battlefield, you may pay {G} to have cats you control gain +0/+1 while you control it, and may pay {W} to gain 1 life for each song and cat you control.
When this song is performed, tap it, the creature that performed it gains first strike this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Songs don't untap during your untap step.
When this song enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target legendary cat. You may pay {G} to put one on target legendary creature. You may pay {R} to deal 2 damage to target creature.
When this song is performed, tap it, your attacking creatures gain +0/+2 this turn.

Songs don't untap during your untap step.
When this song enters the battlefield, untap target song. You may pay {R}{G}{W} to either draw a card or destroy target artifact or enchantment.
When this song is performed, tap it, and up to X target attacking creatures get +X/+X during combat this turn, and untap them. X is the number of your tapped songs.

Songs don't untap during your untap step.
When this song enters the battlefield, you may pay {R}{W} to draw a card.
When this song is performed, tap it, and put a +1/+1 counter on the creature that performed it and another target creature you control.

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings. [i](Add target exiled card that was exiled by spreading your wings to your hand, then exile the top card of your library. Spread your wings only once per turn.)[/i]
Cards added to your hand by Monochromic Personality, Alestiel spreading its wings go to the bottom of your library.

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings. [i](Add target exiled card that was exiled by spreading your wings to your hand, then exile the top card of your library. Spread your wings only once per turn.)[/i]
[i]Black Wings [/i]— Lifelink [i](Black Wings abilities are active if your exiled cards' total mana value is even.)[/i]
[i]White Wings [/i]— Deathtouch [i](White Wings abilities are active if your exiled cards' total mana value is odd.)[/i]

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings. [i](Add target exiled card that was exiled by spreading your wings to your hand, then exile the top card of your library. Spread your wings only once per turn.)[/i]
[i]Black Wings [/i]— {W}: Deal 2 damage to target creature. Activate only once per turn. [i](Black Wings abilities are active if your exiled cards' total mana value is even.)[/i]
[i]White Wings [/i]— {B}: Gain 2 life. Activate only once per turn [i](White Wings abilities are active if your exiled cards' total mana value is odd.)[/i]

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings.
[i]Black Wings[/i] — Angels you control gain hexproof.[i]
White Wings[/i] — When your angel deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, deal 1 damage to any target.

At the start of each of your turns, spread your wings.
[i]Black Wings[/i] — {WB}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target angel.[i]
White Wings[/i] — Your creatures with lifelink gain trample.

While this card is exiled by spreading your wings or its own ability, White Wings and Black Wings are both active.
{T}: Exile Incessant Vocal, Elkel. During your next upkeep, put it in your graveyard.

Haste
When Ultra Concert, Loronerol enters the battlefield, if it was cast, untap all lands and cats you control.
When Ultra Concert, Loronerol attacks, deal X damage to any target and gain X life. X is the number of tapped songs on the battlefield.
{R}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each cat you control.
{T}: Add {RGW}. Use this mana only to cast an enchantment.

Haste
When Sing With Me, Loronerol enters the battlefield, if it was cast, look at the top five cards of your library. Exile up to one of them, and this turn, you may cast it from exile, and if it's from a universe beyond, you may choose to only pay its colored mana costs to cast it.
When Sing With Me, Loronerol attacks, perform target untapped song you control. You may pay {RG}{GW}{RW} to give Loronerol menace or lifelink during this combat. If defending opponent controls a legendary permanent, it gets both.
{T}: Untap target enchantment.

{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact.
{G}, {T}: Target cat gains trample this turn.
{W}, {T}: Target cat gains vigilance this turn.
Suspect [i](A suspected creature has menace and can't block.)[/i]

Cascade
[i]Cerulean Blaze[/i] — {W}{GU}, sacrifice an Everlasting Sapphire: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate.
[i]Coral Flash[/i] — {W}{BR}, sacrifice a Truehearted Ruby: Each opponent draws a card. Draw a card for each opponent that drew.
cards.flavor_text: [i](Cerulean Blaze and Coral Flash may only be activated once per turn. Only one of each may be activated per turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: {C}{C}, {T}: If you control a legendary creature, and all creatures you control are colorless and from universes beyond, draw a card.

Lifelink, Haste, First strike
Affinity for artifact enchantments
When Lururatye enters the battlefield, colorless creatures you control gain power equal to the number of artifacts you control, toughness equal to the number of enchantments you control, and trample this turn

Riot
Fans enter the battlefield with riot.

When a fan enters under your control, create a food token.
Fans you control gain +1/+1.
Musicians you control gain +0/+2.

Riot
{R}: Target musician gains +1/+1 this turn.
{B}: Target musician gains lifelink this turn.
While Grenadine is blocking, it can't take damage if you control three or more musicians with different names or five or more fans. If you control both, your blocking musicians gain double strike.
Musicians enter under your control with riot.

When a musician enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it and Eshma.
When another fan enters the battlefield, if you control a musician, put a +0/+2 counter on that fan and Eshma.
{B}{R}, {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power lower than the highest power among musicians you control.
When a hype spell is cast, create a food token.
When a fan enters under your control, if you control a musician, create a food token.

As an additional cost to cast this spell or put it onto the battlefield by a hype spell, sacrifice X food tokens.
When Purson enters the battlefield, put a +1/+0 counter on X target creatures you control. If X is five or higher, proliferate on X musicians or fans you control.

Riot
If you control FL∀MMe-Glam, Rougia, your abilities that apply to musicians apply to fans, and your abilities that apply to fans apply to musicians.

At the start of combat each turn, target creature gets +1/+0 or -1/-0 for each fan you control.
If you control a musician, fans gain undying.

Choose one:
• Target musician or fan gains indestructible this turn.
• Deal X damage distributed any way among target creatures, where X is the number of musicians you control.
• Deal X damage distributed any way among target creatures, where X is the number of fans you control.
Flashback {B}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Flying
If you control three or more musicians, fans you control gain flying.
Musicians have “Ward {1} or discard a card”.

If you control two or more legendary musicians, return any number of fans and/or musicians with different card names from your graveyard or exile to the battlefield under your control with riot. [i](If they already have it, it triggers twice.)[/i]
Flashback {B}{B}{R}{R}
Cast this spell using flashback only if it's in your graveyard after being cast on a previous turn.
All-Out Jam!! can only be cast once per turn and can't be copied.

This land enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more nonland permanents from universes beyond.

Planet Cray enters the battlefield tapped with a stun counter.
Planet Cray can't be untapped if you control a creature from a universe within, or if you don't control a creature from a universe beyond.
